name: KidTalk
overview: Meet KIDTALK, the revolutionary talking notebook! Any letters, numbers, words, or sentences you type will be spoken back to you in either a male or female voice. You can let your creative imagination run wild, writing stories, reports, poems, plays and movie scripts. Hear each document spoken back to you for proofreading purposes, for your own critical review or for just plain fun! You control the speech settings including gender, tone, pitch, speed and volume. Each KIDTALK user can develop a Pronunciation Dictionary and Secret Codes that add to the fun! KIDTALK is a perfect tool for the young writer of any age!
